text: Pas agar ʙoz zanro taloq dod, (ja'ne taloqi sejum) digar ʙar u halol nest, to on ki ʙa nikohi mardi digare darojad (va ʙo on mard cimo' kunad va na ʙa nijati halol kardani zan ʙaroi savhari avvalaas), va har goh on mardi digar zanro taloq dihad, jo savhari zan ʙimirad va iddaas ʙa oxir rasad, pas ʙar u gunohe nest, ki ʙar savhari avvalaas ʙa nikohi nav ʙozgardad, agar medonand, ki hududi Allohro riojat mekunand, ʙozgastasonro gunohe nest. Inho hududi Alloh hastand va onhoro ʙaroi mardume, ki ahkom va hududi Uro medonand, ʙajon medorad
